introduce:
Hey, I’m Eunkyo! I’m a problem-solver, who has a keen eye for sensible and top-notch design.
With passion to improve people’s lives and to offer more pleasing and satisfying experiences,
I try to always keep up and push my boundaries to learn and broaden my views in the field.
I currently work at Daum Webtoon of Kakao in South Korea.

Feel free to check my resume.
If you’d like to chat, contact me.
